headline: EPAM Announces Date for Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company, will host a conference call at 8:00 a.m. ET, on Thursday, February 19, 2026, to discuss its fourth quarter and full year 2025 financial results. A news release containing these results will be issued before the call.

headline: EPAM Systems' Quarterly Earnings Preview: What You Need to Know
summary: EPAM Systems is expected to unveil its fourth-quarter results soon, and analysts are projecting a double-digit increase in EPS.

headline: 2 Mid-Cap Stocks Worth Investigating and 1 We Brush Off
summary: Mid-cap stocks often strike the right balance between having proven business models and market opportunities that can support $100 billion corporations. However, they face intense competition from scaled industry giants and can be disrupted by new innovative players vying for a slice of the pie.
